title: 3 and Out - Greg McElroy on Arch Manning Hype, NIL/Transfer Portal Chaos, Saban Culture
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Greg McElroy on Arch Manning Hype, NIL/Transfer Portal Chaos, Saban Culture
description:
National championship winning quarterback - and host of the Always College Football Podcast - Greg McElroy discusses expectations for Sark in year two at Texas, if Arch Manning can live up to the hype, if the transfer portal needs to be reigned in, if the reports of astronomical NIL signing numbers are inaccurate, the culture shock of Nick Saban’s first year at Bama, and how he continues to adapt to get his message across.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
